did.repository: The Historical Society of Pennsylvania 1300 Locust Street Philadelphia, PA 19107

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of information on and transcriptions from various New Jersey cemeteries, particularly in Camden and Gloucester counties, compiled by John C. Roloff, Jr. Cemeteries include Bethel German Lutheran Cemetery, Blue Anchor Methodist Cemetery, Blackwood Methodist Cemetery, Cedar Grove Cemetery, Chesilhurst Cemetery, Chew's Landing Methodist Cemetery, and Colestown Cemetery. The amount of information for each cemetery varies (for example, there are transcripts of the inscriptions on over 3000 headstones from Colestown Cemetery, but information on some others consist solely of photocopies of maps or a few death certificates). There are some photocopies of book pages and newspaper articles.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
